message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing [product description]. I think it's worth at least $150, but I'm open to offers. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I think the product is quite nice, but I'm only willing to pay $100 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your interest! While I understand your offer, I'm hoping for something closer to $125 to make this worth my while.  Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still not able to go above $100 for the product. I hope you can work with this price.
